ayahs.indonesian: Apabila matahari digulung,
ayahs.english: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila bintang-bintang berjatuhan,
ayahs.english: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila gunung-gunung dihancurkan,
ayahs.english: And when the mountains are removed

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila unta-unta yang bunting ditinggalkan (tidak terurus),
ayahs.english: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila binatang-binatang liar dikumpulkan,
ayahs.english: And when the wild beasts are gathered

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila lautan dijadikan meluap,
ayahs.english: And when the seas are filled with flame

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila jiwa-jiwa dipertemukan (dengan pasangannya),
ayahs.english: And when the souls are paired

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila bayi-bayi perempuan yang dikubur hidup-hidup ditanya,
ayahs.english: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

ayahs.indonesian: karena dosa apakah dia dibunuh,
ayahs.english: For what sin she was killed

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila catatan-catatan (amal perbuatan manusia) dibuka,
ayahs.english: And when the pages are made public

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila langit dilenyapkan,
ayahs.english: And when the sky is stripped away

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila neraka Jahim dinyalakan,
ayahs.english: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila surga didekatkan,
ayahs.english: And when Paradise is brought near

ayahs.indonesian: maka setiap jiwa akan mengetahui apa yang telah dikerjakannya.
ayahs.english: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

ayahs.indonesian: Maka Aku bersumpah dengan bintang-bintang yang beredar dan terbenam,
ayahs.english: So I swear by the retreating stars

ayahs.indonesian: yang beredar dan terbenam,
ayahs.english: Those that run [their courses] and disappear

ayahs.indonesian: dan malam apabila telah hampir meninggalkan gelapnya,
ayahs.english: And by the night as it closes in

ayahs.indonesian: dan subuh apabila fajarnya mulai menyingsing,
ayahs.english: And by the dawn when it breathes

ayahs.indonesian: sesungguhnya (Al-Qur'an) itu benar-benar firman (Allah yang dibawa oleh) utusan yang mulia (Jibril),
ayahs.english: Indeed, it is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

ayahs.arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Thee quwwatin AAinda thee alAAarshi makeen
ayahs.indonesian: yang mempunyai kekuatan, yang mempunyai kedudukan tinggi di sisi Allah yang mempunyai 'Arsy,
ayahs.english: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

ayahs.indonesian: yang ditaati di sana (di alam malaikat) lagi dipercaya.
ayahs.english: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan temanmu (Muhammad) itu bukanlah orang gila.
ayahs.english: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan sungguh, dia (Muhammad) telah melihatnya (Jibril) di ufuk yang terang.
ayahs.english: And he has already seen him in the clear horizon.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan dia (Muhammad) tidaklah pelit untuk menyampaikan yang gaib.
ayahs.english: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan Al-Qur'an itu bukanlah perkataan setan yang terkutuk,
ayahs.english: And it is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

ayahs.indonesian: Maka ke manakah kamu akan pergi?
ayahs.english: So where are you going?

ayahs.indonesian: Al-Qur'an itu tidak lain hanyalah peringatan bagi seluruh alam,
ayahs.english: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

ayahs.indonesian: (yaitu) bagi siapa di antara kamu yang menghendaki untuk menempuh jalan yang lurus.
ayahs.english: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa an yasha Allahu rabbu alAAalameen
ayahs.indonesian: Dan kamu tidak dapat menghendaki (menempuh jalan itu) kecuali apabila dikehendaki Allah, Tuhan seluruh alam.
ayahs.english: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
